p: MT-null mice, which were deficient in MT-1 and MT-2 genes, and homozygous wild-type mice were obtained from the Murdoch Institute of the Royal Children’s Hospital (Parkville, Australia) and bred as previously reported 15. Male mice aged 6–8 weeks with an approximately equal mean body weight were selected for experiment. All experimental procedures were approved by the Animal Care Committee of Third Military Medical University (Chongqing, China) and were in strict accordance with “Principles of laboratory animal care” (NIH publication No. 85-23, revised 1985) regarding the care of animals used for experimental purposes.
